short_summary: Installation of a new generator for the Chase RCMP detachment
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3899788119 dated March 7, 2023 with a closing of March 21, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of RCMP, has a requirement to install a new generator at the Chase RCMP detachment in Chase, BC. The Work comprises of modifications to the existing electrical distribution system and replacement or additions to the associated electrical equipment. Work of this contract including the general construction of a new exterior rated sound attenuated generator, ATS, primary and secondary feeders, located at Chase RCMP Detachment and further identified as the Chase Detachment New Generator.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
---

## Announcement Title

* **English:** Phase 2 EZ899-231731 Chase RCMP Detachment New Generator
* **French:** Phase 2 EZ899-231731 Nouvelle génératrice pour le détachement de la GRC de Chase

## Reference and Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number:** WS3899788119-Doc4001555224
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3899788119

## Tender Information

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** May 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 26, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** May 18, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** December 11, 2023

### Tender Status

* **English:** Expired
* **French:** Expiré

### Category Information

* **Category:** Construction Services
* **Description:** Electrical System Services, Electrical Power System Construction
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Construction and Maintenance Services
* **Procurement Method:** Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Contracting Entity and End User Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Simon Leung (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Description

A new generator installation and electrical distribution system modification project is required at the Chase RCMP detachment in Chase, BC. The project includes construction of a new exterior rated sound attenuated generator, Automatic Transfer Switch (ATS), primary and secondary feeders, located at Chase RCMP Detachment.  Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of RCMP, invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the project. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to bidders upon request. The solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3899788119.
